title: Triple-Layer Sealing Reinforced to Last Multi-Point Locking System Achieves EU RC2 Security
specs_text: Triple-layer glass-fiber-reinforced sealing gaskets are engineered to resist shrinking and settling over time, ensuring long-lasting airtight and watertight performance. Engineered to deliver comprehen- sive protection — combining superior thermal performance, sound insulation, weather resistance, and long-term durability. Achieves outstanding energy efficiency with a U-factor as low as 0.28 and an SHGC as low as 0.11. 19 Engineered with a clasping lock mechanism, reinforced keeper, and rear locking points, the system achieves exceptional resistance to forced entry — meeting the stringent EU RC2 (WK2) security standard and ensuring lasting home security. title: ROW120E Casement Window with Integrated Screen (Optional Awning Window)
specs_text: 23 Key Features — Enhanced Safety and Anti-drop Mechanism — Bucalu's patented four-bar friction hinge ensures secure connections between the friction stay, frame, and sash, preventing sash detachment and enhancing overall safety. — Ergonomically Designed Handle — The S-Plus series ergonomically designed handle is designed for an intuitive and comfortable grip, ensuring smooth and easy operation every time. — Adjustable Ventilation & Safety — Optional full or half restrictors allow limited micro-ventilation, improving airflow while reducing the risk of sash falling. Security Engineering A clamping locking system with rear locking points delivers resistance to forced entry, tested to meet EU RC2 safety standards. Flush Frame and Sash Design The coplanar design ensures the frame and sash align seamlessly when closed, providing a clean appearance and easier maintenance. Superior Weathersealing Triple sealing system, combined with inserted fiberglass, improves weatherstripping stability, resists thermal deformation, reduces tolerance stacking, and extends seal life.
